description:
Cook, Bartholomew, Shevlin & Cook, LLP

Cook, Bartholomew, Shevlin & Cook, LLP is a premier Belleville, Illinois personal injury firm dedicated to helping victims and their families recover maximum compensation after a personal injury. With extensive and diverse practice experience, the attorneys are able to provide personalized service and strategic advocacy focused on results. The firm has an outstanding reputation for their client service and proven results.

Trusted, Result-Driven Personal Injury Law Firm

Attorneys from the firm understand the significant stress and burdens faced by victims and their families. They take the time to understand the individual circumstances, specific losses, and immediate demands of every case. Working thoroughly to collect maximum compensation, the attorneys apply proven methods to achieve the best possible outcome for clients.

Attorneys are AV ranked and have been named Super Lawyers
The firm has more in excess of million dollar verdicts than any other personal injury firm in the state
Attorneys have recovered over one billion dollars in cases and settlements
The firm routinely turns over seven figure settlements and verdicts to clients

Personalized Support and Client-Oriented Service

Cook, Bartholomew, Shevlin & Cook, LLP is a professional organization with sophisticated technologies and resources to meet the needs of our clients. At every stage, you can trust that we will remain available to answer your questions, address your concerns, and work through any complications that may arise throughout your case. While we are skilled in negotiations and settlement, our firm is also prepared to take any cases to trial. Our priority is your recovery and security, so you can move forward after an accident.

Free consultations · Weekend and evening appointments available. Call 618-310-3050 to speak directly with our Bellville, Illinois lawyers · Home and hospital visits upon request.
